estion "What is the value of \( K \)?" when a line parallel to \( 3x - 7y = 65 \) passes through the point \( (7,4) \) and \( (0,K) \), we need to:
Determine the slope of the line \( 3x - 7y = 65 \).
Write the equation of the line parallel to \( 3x - 7y = 65 \) that passes through the point \( (7,4) \).
Substitute the point \( (7,4) \) into the new equation to find the equation in the form \( y = mx + c \).
Substitute the point \( (0,K) \) into the equation to solve for the value of \( K \).

Substitute the point $(0, K)$ into the equation from step 2 to solve for K.
